findings.title: Delegates moving in transfer
findings.description: There are no delegates move to zero address after funds are sent in the transfer function.

findings.title: Block gas limit
findings.description: The updateEmissionRate function can fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big.

findings.title: add function issue
findings.description: If some LP token is added to the contract twice using function add, then the total amount of reward MYSTERYReward in function updatePool will be incorrect.

findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: The owner has excessive privileges to change deposit fee and mint tokens.
